languages.text: {n}Слово "наследство" заставляет Джай буквально просиять. Но контрабандистка живо берет себя в руки и принимает скорбный вид.{/n}
{n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слово "наследство" заставляет Джай буквально просиять. Но контрабандистка живо берет себя в руки и принимает скорбный вид.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The word "inheritance" practically causes Jae to beam. But she instantly gets her act together and feigns a mournful expression.{/n}
{n}The word "inheritance" practically causes Jae to beam. But she instantly gets her act together and feigns a mournful expression.{/n}
{n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到“遗产”这个词时，婕伊眼睛一亮。但她随后便克制住了自己，摆出了一副哀伤的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到“遗产”这个词时，婕伊眼睛一亮。但她随后便克制住了自己，摆出了一副哀伤的表情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Jae se iluminan ante la palabra «herencia», pero se controla rápidamente y consigue recomponer su expresión lastimera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Jae se iluminan ante la palabra «herencia», pero se controla rápidamente y consigue recomponer su expresión lastimera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイは『遺産』という言葉を聞いて目を輝かせたが、すぐに冷静になり、しんみりとした表情を浮かべようと努めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは『遺産』という言葉を聞いて目を輝かせたが、すぐに冷静になり、しんみりとした表情を浮かべようと努めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bei dem Wort "Erbe" leuchten Jaes Augen auf. Aber sie nimmt sich rasch zusammen und setzt eine trauernde Miene auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei dem Wort "Erbe" leuchten Jaes Augen auf. Aber sie nimmt sich rasch zusammen und setzt eine trauernde Miene auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au mot « {mf|héritier|héritière} », les yeux de Jae s'illuminent, mais elle se ressaisit bien vite pour afficher l'air endeuillé de circonstance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Miras" kelimesini duyan Jae'ın gözleri parlıyor ancak hemen kendisini toparlayıp kederli bir yüz ifadesi takınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes light up at the word "inheritance." But she quickly checks herself and summons up a mournful expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın gözleri "miras" kelimesini duyunca parlıyor ama hemen kendini toparlayıp kederli bir yüz ifadesi takınıyor.{/n}
